title: Login and Landing on Master Map
description: Verify user can log in successfully and lands on the Master Map screen showing overall project progress and KPIs.

steps.description: Navigate to the CODIA Tracker login page.
Enter valid user credentials and submit login.
Verify login is successful and user is taken to the Master Map dashboard.
Verify dashboard displays overall and phase-wise project progress bars and KPIs.

title: Real-time Synchronization of Task Status Updates
description: Verify that task updates made by one user are reflected in real-time across all other active clients and visualizations.

steps.description: With two users logged in on different clients, user A updates a task status in the Checklist to IN_PROGRESS.
Verify user B receives the update instantly without manual refresh.
Verify the status change is reflected consistently in the Master Map, Timeline, Gantt Chart, and Kanban Board for user B.

title: Task Dependency Enforcement on Status Updates
description: Verify that task dependencies and blockers prevent invalid status updates and enforce correct workflow.

steps.description: Attempt to mark a task as DONE while its dependent task is still PENDING or BLOCKED.
Verify the system prevents the status update and displays an appropriate error or warning.
Update the prerequisite dependent task to DONE, then update the task to DONE.
Verify status update is successful and dependencies are respected.

title: Setup Wizard Full Configuration Workflow
description: Verify that the 5-step Setup Wizard correctly loads milestones, allows full configuration input, and saves data to localStorage.

steps.description: Launch the Setup Wizard.
Verify milestone tasks are loaded from the database and displayed in the wizard.
Enter valid configuration data for business info, infrastructure, financial, and AI models.
Complete the Review step and save configuration.
Verify data is saved correctly to localStorage.
Restart the wizard or reload page.
Verify saved configuration is pre-populated from localStorage.

title: Founder Guide Section Accessibility and Navigation
description: Verify that the Founder Guide loads correctly and all 6 sections can be expanded and collapsed with content displayed properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Founder Guide section.
Verify the full guide content loads without errors.
Expand each section: Accounts, Domain, Finance, Security, Dev Tools, Legal.
Verify each section expands to show detailed instructions.
Collapse each expanded section.
Verify each section collapses and hides content as expected.

title: Visual Gantt Chart Interaction and Data Accuracy
description: Verify the Visual Gantt Chart renders tasks accurately with correct coloring, tooltips, and allows zoom and detail modal interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to Visual Gantt Chart view.
Verify all tasks are rendered with bars color-coded by status (Pending, In Progress, Done, Blocked).
Hover over task bars.
Verify tooltips display detailed task information.
Use zoom controls to adjust zoom from 50% to 200%.
Verify zoom in and out works smoothly and timeline adjusts accordingly.
Click a task bar.
Verify detail modal opens with full task details.

title: Kanban Board Drag-and-Drop Task Status Updates
description: Verify that tasks can be dragged and dropped between Pending, In Progress, Done, and Blocked columns and updates persist.

steps.description: Navigate to the Kanban Board.
Verify tasks are displayed in their respective status columns.
Drag a task card from Pending to In Progress column.
Verify the task status updates immediately and persists after reload.
Drag a task card to Blocked column.
Verify task reflects Blocked status and blockers are tracked.

title: Activity Logs Real-time Feed and Accuracy
description: Verify activity logs correctly display system and task events with accurate timestamps and update live without refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to Activity Logs view.
Verify recent system and task events appear with correct timestamps.
Perform a task update on another client.
Verify the log feed updates live and displays the new event.

title: Master Map Visualization and Data Consistency
description: Verify Master Map graph visualizes tasks with accurate dependencies and relationships reflecting current project state.

steps.description: Navigate to the Master Map screen.
Verify all tasks are represented as nodes with visible dependency edges.
Verify dependency relations on the graph match backend data.
Update a task dependency status or blocker.
Verify Master Map updates in real-time to reflect changes.

title: Mermaid Diagram Viewer Rendering and Toggle Functionality
description: Verify Mermaid Diagram Viewer fetches database-stored diagrams correctly and toggles between visual and code views.

steps.description: Open Mermaid Diagram Viewer and load an .mmd document from the database.
Verify the diagram renders correctly as interactive SVG.
Toggle from Visual view to Code view.
Verify underlying Mermaid source code is displayed.
Toggle back to Visual view.
Verify the SVG interactive diagram re-displays correctly.

title: GAP Analysis Dashboard Data Accuracy and Refresh
description: Verify GAP Analysis Dashboard accurately shows real-time project metrics according to backend data and refreshes automatically.

steps.description: Open GAP Analysis Dashboard.
Verify displayed metrics (total tasks, completed, in-progress, pending, GAP %) match backend data from /gap_analysis endpoint.
Trigger task status updates from another client.
Verify dashboard updates automatically to reflect latest metrics.

title: Timeline View Chronological Task Ordering and Milestone Display
description: Verify Timeline View shows tasks in correct chronological order with milestones highlighted and status indicators visible.

steps.description: Open Timeline View.
Verify tasks are ordered by date ascending and milestones are visually distinct.
Verify status indicators correspond to each task's current status.
Update a task's status and verify the timeline reflects the changes.

title: Supabase Backend API Endpoint Validation
description: Verify all Supabase backend API endpoints respond correctly with expected data and handle errors suitably.

steps.description: Send GET requests to all endpoints like /tasks, /gap_analysis, /logs, /tracker_app_data, /phases and confirm valid 200 responses.
Verify data schemas match expected formats and data completeness.
Send PUT requests for task updates with valid and invalid payloads.
Verify successful updates with valid data and appropriate error responses for invalid data.
Test WebSocket subscription to real-time change notifications.
Verify subscription successfully receives task update events.

title: Edge Case: Large Number of Tasks and Deep Hierarchies
description: Verify that the application handles large task volumes and deep hierarchical task structures without UI or performance degradation.

steps.description: Import or generate a large dataset with >1000 tasks and multiple nested levels.
Verify Checklist and Master Map load and render all tasks correctly within reasonable time.
Perform status updates and drag-and-drop operations on deep nested tasks.
Verify UI remains responsive and all updates sync in real-time.

title: Error Handling on Network Failure During Updates
description: Verify that the system gracefully handles network interruptions or backend errors during task update operations.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or force API error during a task status update PUT request.
Verify user receives proper error feedback and update is not lost.
Restore network and retry the update.
Verify update succeeds and synchronizes across clients.
